Trade/Device Name(s): ADVIA Centaur Toxoplasma IgG (Toxo G) Assay
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Microparticle direct in vitro diagnostic immunoassay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVIA Centaur Toxoplasma IgG (Toxo G) Assay, an ELISA for detection of IgG antibodies to Toxoplasma gondii in serum or plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative and qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to Toxoplasma gondii in human serum or plasma, aiding in assessment of immunological response, including in women of childbearing age; may be used with IgM result to determine recent serological response.
